## Notes for Publication Materials

```
## Fast, comparable to `stopifnot` for simple checks
## faster for complex ones

mx.3.col.num <- matrix(numeric(), ncol=3)
mx1 <- matrix(1:12, 4)
mx2 <- matrix(1:12, 3)

microbenchmark(
  vet(mx.3.col.num, mx1),
  stopifnot(is.matrix(mx1), is.numeric(mx1), ncol(mx1) == 3)
)

x <- iris
microbenchmark(
    is.list(x), inherits(x, "data.frame"),
    length(x) == 5, is.integer(attr(x, 'row.names')),
    identical(
      names(x),
      c("Sepal.Length", "Sepal.Width", "Petal.Length", "Petal.Width", "Species")
    ),
    all(vapply(x[1:4], is.numeric, logical(1L))),
    typeof(x$Species) == "integer", is.factor(x$Species),
    identical(levels(x$Species), c("setosa", "versicolor", "virginica"))
  )
```
